descriptionlist.description: Centaur is a sleek and modern notification center that supports all devices running iOS 11 and iOS 12. It's accessible by swiping down from the top of the screen. Centaur provides four customizable modules: • Device Information . Shows time, date, battery charge, network signal strength. • Music control . Shows information about the track currently playing and track switching buttons. • Control center switches . Shows the main switches from the communication unit in the control center. • Notifications . Shows previews and details of all your notifications..
